setDescription(java.lang.CharSequence).Description: Sets the description for the current header item. This will be visible when the row receives focus.

getContentDescription().Description: Returns optional content description for the HeaderItem. When it is null, @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#HeaderItem#getName_E@ should be used for the content description.

getId().Description: Returns a unique identifier for this item.

getName().Description: Returns the name of this header item.

HeaderItem(java.lang.String, java.lang.S.Description: Create a header item. All fields are optional.

Parameters: CharSequence: Content description sets on the HeaderItem.
setContentDescription(java.lang.CharSequ.Description: Sets optional content description for the HeaderItem.

getDescription().Description: Returns the description for the current row.

HeaderItem(long, java.lang.String).Description: Create a header item. All fields are optional.

getImageUri().Description: Returns the icon for this header item.

ClassDesc: A header item describes the metadata of a @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#Row_E@, such as a category of media items. May be subclassed to add more information.
